name: Ghosting Gun S
description: Fight the Plague with easy to learn controls and a linear game play focused on action in this 2D action game inspired by arcade games of old; Deal with enemies from a distance with your guns or get in close and personal with your blades, but mostly, combine them both to dominate the fight.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 2.66GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 500MB or better Storage: 370 MB available space Additional Notes: A gamepad is recommended.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0GHZ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 500MB or better Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: A gamepad is recommended.
